00050     // All OPENCV_GPU_IMPLEMENT_*_TRAITS(ColorSpace1_to_ColorSpace2, ...) macros implements
00051     // template <typename T> class ColorSpace1_to_ColorSpace2_traits
00052     // {
00053     //     typedef ... functor_type;
00054     //     static __host__ __device__ functor_type create_functor();
00055     // };
